text: Ramesh Chandra Lahoti (1 November 1940 - 23 March 2022) was an Indian judge. He was the 35th Chief Justice of India from 1 June 2004 to 1 November 2005. Lahoti died on 23 March 2022 in New Delhi, India at the age of 81. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Chief justices of India
title: Ramesh Chandra Lahoti
